ygData.subject: RE: strenght comments
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a base 80 and I am a HE. I never put any effort into buffing my strength, just the armors and items I chose happened to have some str buffs attached an
ygData.messageBody:
I have a base 80 and I am a HE. I never put any effort into buffing my
strength, just the armors and items I chose happened to have some str buffs
attached an my str is 93. More than enough, way more. Now dont laugh and I
will explain myself. When do you need str? In a fight, right? If your party
doesnt have a Shaman, then your in trouble to begin with. Shamans are by far
the most necessary and versatile member of a party, next to a Bard of
course. I get a nice strength buff from him just the lil one that takes me
to 126 str, then in a fight I am playing Anthem, 136, then my PGT procs in
the fight, 156. Not too shabby. If he hits me with his 39th lvl str spell
and all these other things happen I have 173 strength, woohoo!. So basically
I put all my wearable buffs into dex/agil, also good stuff that a Shaman can
buff. I love looking at my stats during a fight though.
Dex=156
Agil=170
Str=173
Stam=125

Yeah baby! Get a Shaman.

-----Original Message-----
From: CYR, Thierry [mailto:tcyr@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 2:05 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] strenght comments


From: "CYR, Thierry" <tcyr@...>

weight is only a problem when you're high teens/early 20's. after that you
start making money, get str items.

my base str is 85, with my items im up to 112str. 2 str earings +3 each.
jagged bands(+3str/5ac) are not bad rings, but the +4str/+2wis rings are
nicer (jeweler made, think they're ruby electrum. Plat Ruby veil
(+7str,+7wis). black iron crown(5ac, +5 str and +5 all resists) or if you're
lucky a crested helm (+6str/+3charisma 10ac). Another nice item if you can
get one is a golden pearl choker, doesnt give str but +7 agi and +7dex.

you see there's plenty of str buffers out there, im wearing full steel
medium plate and weight about 82-83, leaves me a good 20 to stock up on
junk, but we go for giants, which drop more platinum that FS weapons (which
make you heavy)

Minkin Nehoc
Solusek Ro
Bard of the 30th chorus

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Llewrend Lynnhaven [SMTP:lordartos@...]
> Sent: August 18, 1999 4:52 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] RE: lowest price possible
>
> From: Llewrend Lynnhaven <lordartos@...>

> Calm down bevis, it's just a game. My str right now
> is around 125 with items, and I have a light burlap
> sack that makes everything weightless and doesn't
> dissapear. Yes, I was worried about weight a while
> back, but it's not much of a problem anymore
